title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies     Unmanned Aerial Vehicles                Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Are Prohibited          Launching, landing or operating unmanned or remote controlled aircraft within Mount Rushmore National Memorial is prohibited (36 CFR 1.5 Closures & Public Limits). Read the news release from June 20, 2014, explaining the decision.
